ValidationRule.description: Fields in the Discount section should be required when Resolution Type is 'Stabilize' and Resolution Type Details is 'Discount'.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Case_Lookup__r.Reason , 'Reactive') && ISPICKVAL( Resolution_type__c, 'Stabilize') && ISPICKVAL( Resolution_Type_Details__c , 'Discount') && (ISPICKVAL(Discount_Reason__c, '') || ISBLANK(Current_Preview_Discount__c ) || ISBLANK(Retention_Discount__c ) || ISBLANK(Discount_of_Free_Months__c ) || ISBLANK(Discount_Free_W2_s_of_years__c ) || ISBLANK(Other_types_of_discounts__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: All fields in the Discount Related section need to be populated.
